string.text: Sid has finally dug up info regarding that Strelok guy, and now I need to met a stalker by the name of Seriy at the Garbage. It's the only clue at the moment, so it's not like I have a choice... again.
There seems to be a problem for a stalker group at the Garbage: their "head", Bes, sent an SOS signal. Well, I need to meet them and find out what's wrong.
Bes told me that some shithead is having fun "shooting turkey" with a sniper rifle. I need to deal with the moron, but before that I should get to that green house not far away and grab some shooter.
Seriy's boys are having trouble with some bandits, and they decided to attempt retaking the hangar currently occupied by the assholes. It's in my interest this doesn't fail.

A squad of some "Duty" requested assistance taking out a wave of mutants and guaranteed their gratitude to all who'd help deal with the sons of a bitch. I think I'll need to find out who those Duty characters are...
The Duty checkpoint leader offered me a deal: I take out the local beasts, and they grant me free access to the Great Metal Factory. These guys seem alright, I don't think they're bullshitting me.

Mole writes to Seriy: "Me and the boys might've dug up Strelok's stash at the Institute. The loot isn't worth much, but we're not after it... we're after something more valuable. Anyway, come by sometime - and we'll drink!"
The Sin negotiator's agreed to exchange the "Goldfish" artifact for the Duty disc. If there's a peaceful way of doing all this, I should choose it.
Comrade General's ordered me to meet one of his men. I'm not sure why - but there's only one way to find out...
I should've guessed: I and the guys are about to destroy the Sin base. That's the last hour those pricks will survive, haha!
